hero.title: Intercultural Center for Children, Youth, and Families
hero.description: We foster creativity, communication, and cultural diversity, because every talent deserves to be discovered

title.before: For more than ten years TALANT E.V has been helping children and adults

hero.subtitle: Our motto “Awaken your talent!” is a call to discover, develop and share your abilities.

programs.text: We offer a wide range of educational, creative and social programs for children, teenagers and families.

cooperation.text: We promote intercultural meetings, exchange and cooperation between young people from different countries.

project.text: The project supports dialogue and cultural exchange among young people.

1.title: How can I register for a course?
1.answer: You can register via the form on our website or by contacting us directly.

2.title: Where do the courses take place?
2.answer: Courses are held on-site and online, including outside of Münster.

3.title: What kind of support can I receive?
3.answer: We provide educational, creative and social support.

4.title: How does support with official documents work?
4.answer: We provide consultation and assistance with the preparation of official documents.

cta.title: Would you like to participate, cooperate or support us?
cta.subtitle: We are open to new ideas, teams and creative partners.

hero.subtitle: We actively participate in international partnerships outside Münster and promote intercultural encounters, exchange, and cooperation between young people from different countries—through culture, education, art, and sports.
A brief description of the news to give a little background on what happened there. A brief description of the news to give a little background on what happened there.
At our center, children, teenagers, and families can express themselves, learn new things, and develop in various ways.
